What do guests like most about Kaldan Samudhra Palace?Show moreMore about Kaldan Samudhra PalaceUnwind and Indulge in Entertainment at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we believe in providing our guests with a truly immersive and unforgettable experience. Our entertainment facilities are designed to cater to all your leisure needs, ensuring that you have a delightful stay with us.

Step into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at our luxurious spa. Indulge in a range of therapeutic treatments and massages that will leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized. Our skilled therapists will take care of your every need, ensuring that you experience ultimate bliss during your stay.

Explore our lush garden, a tranquil oasis amidst the bustling city. Take a leisurely stroll and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature. The garden provides the perfect setting for a peaceful retreat, where you can unwind and reconnect with yourself.

For book lovers, our library offers a wide selection of books across various genres. Whether you prefer fiction, non-fiction, or travel guides, you'll find something to suit your taste. Curl up with a good book in our cozy reading nooks and let your imagination soar.

Don't forget to visit our gift and souvenir shop, where you can find unique mementos to commemorate your stay. From traditional handicrafts to locally sourced products, our shop has a range of options for you to choose from.

At Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we ensure that your entertainment needs are met, allowing you to create lasting memories during your stay with us.Unwind and Stay Active at Kaldan Samudhra Palace's Sports FacilitiesAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can indulge in a variety of sports facilities that will keep you entertained and active throughout your stay. Dive into the refreshing outdoor pool and feel the stress melt away as you swim laps or simply relax by the water's edge. The pool area is surrounded by lush greenery, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere.

For those seeking some beachside fun, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a private beach where you can soak up the sun, build sandcastles, or take leisurely walks along the shore. Feel the soft sand between your toes as you enjoy the breathtaking views of the ocean. Whether you prefer to bask in the sun or take a refreshing dip in the sea, the private beach provides the perfect setting for a day of relaxation and rejuvenation.

In addition to the pool and beach, Kaldan Samudhra Palace also features a dart board, perfect for those who enjoy friendly competition. Gather your friends or family and engage in a lively game of darts, testing your aim and strategy. The dart board area is designed with a cozy and inviting ambiance, making it a great spot to unwind and have some fun.

With its outdoor pool, private beach, and dart board, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a range of sports facilities that cater to every guest's preferences. Whether you are seeking relaxation or excitement, these amenities provide the perfect balance for a memorable stay.Unparalleled Convenience at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we take pride in providing unparalleled convenience to our guests. With a range of exceptional facilities and services, we ensure that your stay is comfortable and hassle-free.

Our 24-hour room service is at your disposal, allowing you to indulge in delectable meals or snacks anytime you desire. Our dedicated staff is always ready to assist you with your laundry needs, ensuring that your clothes are fresh and clean throughout your stay.

For your safety and peace of mind, we offer safety deposit boxes where you can securely store your valuables. Our concierge service is available to assist you with any queries or arrangements you may need, making your stay even more convenient. Stay connected with our complimentary Wi-Fi in both public areas and all rooms, allowing you to stay in touch with loved ones or catch up on work. Additionally, we provide a designated smoking area for guests who prefer to smoke.

With our express check-in/check-out service, you can save time and start enjoying your stay right away. Leave your luggage worries behind with our luggage storage facility. Our dedicated housekeeping team ensures that your room is kept clean and tidy, providing daily housekeeping services. At Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we prioritize your convenience and strive to make your stay truly memorable.Convenient Transport Facilities at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we understand the importance of hassle-free transportation during your stay. If you prefer to drive, our hotel provides both valet parking and a car park, ensuring that your vehicle is secure and easily accessible throughout your stay. Additionally, we offer a taxi service for those who prefer to explore the city without the hassle of driving. 

For those looking to explore the local attractions, our ticket service can assist you in booking tickets for various tours and activities. Whether you're interested in historical sites, cultural experiences, or thrilling adventures, our knowledgeable staff will help you plan your itinerary. 

Best of all, our car park is free of charge, allowing you to park your vehicle without any additional fees. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.

If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. From here, you can also opt for taxis, private transfers, or public transportation to reach your destination. The journey from Pondicherry Airport to Mahabalipuram takes approximately 2 hours, offering you ample time to soak in the picturesque landscapes of Tamil Nadu.

No matter which airport you choose to arrive at, once you reach Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you'll be greeted by its exquisite architecture, lush gardens, and serene ambiance. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. From the aromatic flavors of Arabian cuisine at ARABIAN GARDEN MULTI CUISINE RESTAURANT and the fresh seafood delights at Arabian garden seafood restaurant, to the authentic South Indian dishes at Sri Ananda Bhavan and the mouthwatering Indian and Chinese fusion at Wok To Dhaba Restaurant, there is something to satisfy every palate. For those craving international flavors, Moonrakers Restaurant offers a diverse menu with dishes from around the world. If you prefer traditional Chettinad cuisine, head to Virunthombal Chettinadu, where you can savor the rich and spicy flavors of this regional specialty. For a taste of pure vegetarian fare, The Golden Palate (Pure Vegetarian Restaurant) - Hotel Mamallaa Heritage is the perfect choice. And if you're in the mood for a beachside dining experience, Santana Beach Restaurant offers a picturesque setting with breathtaking views of the ocean. Whether you're a food enthusiast or simply looking to indulge in a memorable meal, the surrounding restaurants near Kaldan Samudhra Palace will leave you satisfied and craving for more.Shop 'til you drop in MamallapuramLocated just a stone's throw away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you'll find an array of shopping landmarks to satisfy your retail therapy cravings. Art enthusiasts will be delighted to explore Srinithi Art Gallery, which showcases exquisite artworks and handicrafts created by local artists. Apollo Books is another must-visit destination for book lovers, featuring a vast collection of books on various genres. For those looking to bring home a piece of Mamallapuram's rich cultural heritage, Poompuhar Handicrafts Emporium offers a treasure trove of traditional handicrafts, sculptures, and artwork. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,963)Business travelers (4)Couples (815)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (540)Families with teens (82)Groups (215)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 615 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345123Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,976)Business travelers (4)Couples (815)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (540)Families with teens (82)Groups (215)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 617 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345124Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.

If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. From here, you can also opt for taxis, private transfers, or public transportation to reach your destination. The journey from Pondicherry Airport to Mahabalipuram takes approximately 2 hours, offering you ample time to soak in the picturesque landscapes of Tamil Nadu.

No matter which airport you choose to arrive at, once you reach Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you'll be greeted by its exquisite architecture, lush gardens, and serene ambiance. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. For those craving international flavors, Moonrakers Restaurant offers a diverse menu with dishes from around the world. If you prefer traditional Chettinad cuisine, head to Virunthombal Chettinadu, where you can savor the rich and spicy flavors of this regional specialty. And if you're in the mood for a beachside dining experience, Santana Beach Restaurant offers a picturesque setting with breathtaking views of the ocean. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,976)Business travelers (4)Couples (819)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (540)Families with teens (82)Groups (216)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 617 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345124Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Best Regards,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. You should, prior to checking in, re-check the status of the measures made available at the Property as these may change from time to time.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>If you experience any issues after you\'ve checked in, you should contact the Property directly.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Please note, you may be denied check-in to the Property due to high body temperature or contagious disease.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Agoda wish to clarify that the accommodation services including the Hygiene Plus measures provided by Property through the Agoda platform shall be the sole responsibility and liability of the Property.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Unless as specified here otherwise, all other terms of Agoda’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy remain applicable.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<\/div>',wellness:"Wellness",wellnessTabDescription:"Everything you need for a rejuvenating retreat for both body and spirit.",seeAllAmenities:"See all amenities",staycationWellness:"Wellness",drinkingAndDining:"Food and Drinks",activities:"Activities",sportsAndEntertainment:"Sports & Entertainment",staycationOffersAvailable:"Staycation offers available",staycationDescription:"Get special benefits for your stay",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerTravellingCountry:"Travelling to {0}?",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerText:"{0} Read all updated requirements before you book.",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerLink:"Learn more",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerDomesticText:"Traveling from overseas to {0}? Don't miss it!",hygienePlusForHomesMarkdown:'<div class="bcard-terms-txt">\n\t<p>\n\t\tAgoda allows properties to self-declare, to potential guests, that the properties have put in place certain amenities, measures, and/or efforts (together, “amenities”), including but not limited to amenities conducive to a cleaner or more hygienic environment on their premises. Those properties that self-declare certain amenities relating to cleanliness or hygiene may also elect to display a Hygiene Plus badge.\n\t<\/p>\n\t<p>\n\t\t<u>Neither the Hygiene Plus badge nor any amenities-related information displayed on Agoda is a guarantee from Agoda that an accommodation is risk-free or that risk has been controlled to a certain level.<\/u> On their initiative, each property simply self-declares to potential guests that the property has put in place certain amenities, as listed on its Agoda property page. Agoda does <u>not<\/u> verify or certify such self-declarations. \n\t<\/p>\n\t<p>\n\t\tAs a traveler, you have the responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay.     {"@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"Hotel","name":"Kaldan Samudhra Palace","url":"https://www.agoda.com/en-in/kaldan-samudhra/hotel/chennai-in.html","image":"//pix8.agoda.net/hotelImages/29418285/-1/a2a050c001cd2897c6c1a94f7828f343.jpg?ca=29&ce=0&s=1024x768","address":{"@type":"PostalAddress","addressCountry":"India","addressLocality":"Mahabalipuram","addressRegion":"Mamallapuram","postalCode":"603103","streetAddress":"16/3B1B, Devaneri, East Coast Road, Mamallapuram, Chengulpet "},"description":"Unwind and Indulge in Entertainment at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we believe in providing our guests with a truly immersive and unforgettable experience. Our entertainment facilities are designed to cater to all your leisure needs, ensuring that you have a delightful stay with us.\n\nStep into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at our luxurious spa. Indulge in a range of therapeutic treatments and massages that will leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized. Our skilled therapists will take care of your every need, ensuring that you experience ultimate bliss during your stay.\n\nExplore our lush garden, a tranquil oasis amidst the bustling city. Take a leisurely stroll and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature. The garden provides the perfect setting for a peaceful retreat, where you can unwind and reconnect with yourself.\n\nFor book lovers, our library offers a wide selection of books across various genres. Whether you prefer fiction, non-fiction, or travel guides, you'll find something to suit your taste. Curl up with a good book in our cozy reading nooks and let your imagination soar.\n\nDon't forget to visit our gift and souvenir shop, where you can find unique mementos to commemorate your stay. From traditional handicrafts to locally sourced products, our shop has a range of options for you to choose from.\n\nAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we ensure that your entertainment needs are met, allowing you to create lasting memories during your stay with us.Unwind and Stay Active at Kaldan Samudhra Palace's Sports FacilitiesAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can indulge in a variety of sports facilities that will keep you entertained and active throughout your stay. Dive into the refreshing outdoor pool and feel the stress melt away as you swim laps or simply relax by the water's edge. The pool area is surrounded by lush greenery, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere.\n\nFor those seeking some beachside fun, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a private beach where you can soak up the sun, build sandcastles, or take leisurely walks along the shore. Feel the soft sand between your toes as you enjoy the breathtaking views of the ocean. Whether you prefer to bask in the sun or take a refreshing dip in the sea, the private beach provides the perfect setting for a day of relaxation and rejuvenation.\n\nIn addition to the pool and beach, Kaldan Samudhra Palace also features a dart board, perfect for those who enjoy friendly competition. Gather your friends or family and engage in a lively game of darts, testing your aim and strategy. The dart board area is designed with a cozy and inviting ambiance, making it a great spot to unwind and have some fun.\n\nWith its outdoor pool, private beach, and dart board, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a range of sports facilities that cater to every guest's preferences. Whether you are seeking relaxation or excitement, these amenities provide the perfect balance for a memorable stay.Unparalleled Convenience at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we take pride in providing unparalleled convenience to our guests. With a range of exceptional facilities and services, we ensure that your stay is comfortable and hassle-free.\n\nOur 24-hour room service is at your disposal, allowing you to indulge in delectable meals or snacks anytime you desire. Our dedicated staff is always ready to assist you with your laundry needs, ensuring that your clothes are fresh and clean throughout your stay.\n\nFor your safety and peace of mind, we offer safety deposit boxes where you can securely store your valuables. Our concierge service is available to assist you with any queries or arrangements you may need, making your stay even more convenient. Stay connected with our complimentary Wi-Fi in both public areas and all rooms, allowing you to stay in touch with loved ones or catch up on work. Additionally, we provide a designated smoking area for guests who prefer to smoke.\n\nWith our express check-in/check-out service, you can save time and start enjoying your stay right away. Leave your luggage worries behind with our luggage storage facility. Our dedicated housekeeping team ensures that your room is kept clean and tidy, providing daily housekeeping services. At Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we prioritize your convenience and strive to make your stay truly memorable.Convenient Transport Facilities at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we understand the importance of hassle-free transportation during your stay. That's why we offer a range of convenient transport facilities to ensure your journey is as smooth as possible. \n\nFor guests arriving by air, our airport transfer service is available to pick you up from the airport and bring you directly to the hotel. This service takes away the stress of finding transportation upon arrival, allowing you to start your vacation without any delays. \n\nIf you prefer to drive, our hotel provides both valet parking and a car park, ensuring that your vehicle is secure and easily accessible throughout your stay. Additionally, we offer a taxi service for those who prefer to explore the city without the hassle of driving. \n\nFor those looking to explore the local attractions, our ticket service can assist you in booking tickets for various tours and activities. Whether you're interested in historical sites, cultural experiences, or thrilling adventures, our knowledgeable staff will help you plan your itinerary. \n\nBest of all, our car park is free of charge, allowing you to park your vehicle without any additional fees. With our comprehensive range of transport facilities, Kaldan Samudhra Palace ensures that your stay is not only comfortable but also convenient.Indulge in Exquisite Dining at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, guests can embark on a culinary journey like no other. With a range of dining facilities to choose from, your taste buds are in for a treat. Start your day with a delightful breakfast buffet, offering a wide selection of continental dishes that will satisfy even the most discerning palates. \n\nFor a quick pick-me-up or a casual gathering, head to the coffee shop, where you can enjoy a steaming cup of freshly brewed coffee and indulge in a variety of light snacks and pastries. The cozy and relaxed ambiance makes it the perfect spot to unwind and catch up with friends or simply enjoy some alone time.\n\nWhen it comes to a memorable dining experience, the restaurant at Kaldan Samudhra Palace is a must-visit. Immerse yourself in a world of flavors as you savor authentic Indian delicacies and international cuisine prepared by skilled chefs. The extensive menu caters to all tastes and dietary preferences, ensuring a truly satisfying meal for every guest.\n\nWhether you prefer the convenience of 24-hour room service or the vibrant atmosphere of the dining facilities, Kaldan Samudhra Palace has you covered. With daily housekeeping ensuring a clean and comfortable environment, you can focus on enjoying the delectable culinary offerings during your stay.Luxurious and Spacious Rooms at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceIndulge in a world of luxury and comfort at Kaldan Samudhra Palace in Mamallapuram, India. With a range of exquisite room offerings, this hotel promises a truly unforgettable stay. Choose from the Deluxe King Pool View room, featuring a generous 45 square meters of space and a plush King Bed, or opt for the Deluxe Twin room, offering 33 square meters and two comfortable Single Beds. For those seeking ultimate opulence, the Executive Palace Suite King provides a sprawling 82 square meters of pure luxury, complete with a lavish King Bed.\n\nBooking your stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace through Agoda not only ensures a hassle-free experience but also guarantees you the best prices available. With Agoda's extensive network and partnerships, you can rest assured that you are getting the most competitive rates for these exceptional rooms. So why wait? Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.\n\nStep back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.\n\nBeyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.\n\nImmerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.\n\nWhether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.\n\nIf you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.\n\nAnother nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. What do guests like most about Kaldan Samudhra Palace?Show moreMore about Kaldan Samudhra PalaceUnwind and Indulge in Entertainment at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we believe in providing our guests with a truly immersive and unforgettable experience. Our entertainment facilities are designed to cater to all your leisure needs, ensuring that you have a delightful stay with us.

Step into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation at our luxurious spa. Indulge in a range of therapeutic treatments and massages that will leave you feeling refreshed and revitalized. Our skilled therapists will take care of your every need, ensuring that you experience ultimate bliss during your stay.

Explore our lush garden, a tranquil oasis amidst the bustling city. Take a leisurely stroll and immerse yourself in the beauty of nature. The garden provides the perfect setting for a peaceful retreat, where you can unwind and reconnect with yourself.

For book lovers, our library offers a wide selection of books across various genres. Whether you prefer fiction, non-fiction, or travel guides, you'll find something to suit your taste. Curl up with a good book in our cozy reading nooks and let your imagination soar.

Don't forget to visit our gift and souvenir shop, where you can find unique mementos to commemorate your stay. From traditional handicrafts to locally sourced products, our shop has a range of options for you to choose from.

At Kaldan Samudhra Palace, we ensure that your entertainment needs are met, allowing you to create lasting memories during your stay with us.Unwind and Stay Active at Kaldan Samudhra Palace's Sports FacilitiesAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can indulge in a variety of sports facilities that will keep you entertained and active throughout your stay. Dive into the refreshing outdoor pool and feel the stress melt away as you swim laps or simply relax by the water's edge. The pool area is surrounded by lush greenery, creating a serene and tranquil atmosphere.

For those seeking some beachside fun, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a private beach where you can soak up the sun, build sandcastles, or take leisurely walks along the shore. Feel the soft sand between your toes as you enjoy the breathtaking views of the ocean. Whether you prefer to bask in the sun or take a refreshing dip in the sea, the private beach provides the perfect setting for a day of relaxation and rejuvenation.

In addition to the pool and beach, Kaldan Samudhra Palace also features a dart board, perfect for those who enjoy friendly competition. Gather your friends or family and engage in a lively game of darts, testing your aim and strategy. The dart board area is designed with a cozy and inviting ambiance, making it a great spot to unwind and have some fun.

With its outdoor pool, private beach, and dart board, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a range of sports facilities that cater to every guest's preferences. The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. You should, prior to checking in, re-check the status of the measures made available at the Property as these may change from time to time.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>If you experience any issues after you\'ve checked in, you should contact the Property directly.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Please note, you may be denied check-in to the Property due to high body temperature or contagious disease.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Agoda wish to clarify that the accommodation services including the Hygiene Plus measures provided by Property through the Agoda platform shall be the sole responsibility and liability of the Property.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>Unless as specified here otherwise, all other terms of Agoda’s Terms of Use and Privacy Policy remain applicable.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<\/div>',wellness:"Wellness",wellnessTabDescription:"Everything you need for a rejuvenating retreat for both body and spirit.",seeAllAmenities:"See all amenities",staycationWellness:"Wellness",drinkingAndDining:"Food and Drinks",activities:"Activities",sportsAndEntertainment:"Sports & Entertainment",staycationOffersAvailable:"Staycation offers available",staycationDescription:"Get special benefits for your stay",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerTravellingCountry:"Travelling to {0}?",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerText:"{0} Read all updated requirements before you book.",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerLink:"Learn more",travelAdvisorPropertyBannerDomesticText:"Traveling from overseas to {0}?
