Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.

If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. From here, you can also opt for taxis, private transfers, or public transportation to reach your destination. The journey from Pondicherry Airport to Mahabalipuram takes approximately 2 hours, offering you ample time to soak in the picturesque landscapes of Tamil Nadu.

No matter which airport you choose to arrive at, once you reach Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you'll be greeted by its exquisite architecture, lush gardens, and serene ambiance. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. From the aromatic flavors of Arabian cuisine at ARABIAN GARDEN MULTI CUISINE RESTAURANT and the fresh seafood delights at Arabian garden seafood restaurant, to the authentic South Indian dishes at Sri Ananda Bhavan and the mouthwatering Indian and Chinese fusion at Wok To Dhaba Restaurant, there is something to satisfy every palate. For those craving international flavors, Moonrakers Restaurant offers a diverse menu with dishes from around the world. If you prefer traditional Chettinad cuisine, head to Virunthombal Chettinadu, where you can savor the rich and spicy flavors of this regional specialty. For a taste of pure vegetarian fare, The Golden Palate (Pure Vegetarian Restaurant) - Hotel Mamallaa Heritage is the perfect choice. And if you're in the mood for a beachside dining experience, Santana Beach Restaurant offers a picturesque setting with breathtaking views of the ocean. Whether you're a food enthusiast or simply looking to indulge in a memorable meal, the surrounding restaurants near Kaldan Samudhra Palace will leave you satisfied and craving for more.Shop 'til you drop in MamallapuramLocated just a stone's throw away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you'll find an array of shopping landmarks to satisfy your retail therapy cravings. JK Bookshop is a haven for bookworms, offering a wide selection of books ranging from bestsellers to rare finds. Art enthusiasts will be delighted to explore Srinithi Art Gallery, which showcases exquisite artworks and handicrafts created by local artists. Apollo Books is another must-visit destination for book lovers, featuring a vast collection of books on various genres. For those looking to bring home a piece of Mamallapuram's rich cultural heritage, Poompuhar Handicrafts Emporium offers a treasure trove of traditional handicrafts, sculptures, and artwork. Whether you're searching for a literary gem, a unique piece of art, or a cultural memento, Mamallapuram's shopping landmarks have something for everyone.Affordable Luxury at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceEscape to the enchanting coastal town of Mamallapuram and experience the epitome of luxury at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,989)Business travelers (4)Couples (823)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (543)Families with teens (82)Groups (216)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 619 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345124Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,991)Business travelers (4)Couples (825)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (544)Families with teens (82)Groups (216)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 620 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345124Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.

If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. From here, you can also opt for taxis, private transfers, or public transportation to reach your destination. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. For those craving international flavors, Moonrakers Restaurant offers a diverse menu with dishes from around the world. If you prefer traditional Chettinad cuisine, head to Virunthombal Chettinadu, where you can savor the rich and spicy flavors of this regional specialty. And if you're in the mood for a beachside dining experience, Santana Beach Restaurant offers a picturesque setting with breathtaking views of the ocean. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (1,994)Business travelers (4)Couples (828)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (544)Families with teens (82)Groups (216)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 626 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345126Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (2,005)Business travelers (4)Couples (828)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (546)Families with teens (83)Groups (216)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 627 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345126Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures. Treat yourself to a truly memorable stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace and book your room today on Agoda.Discover the Ancient Marvels of MahabalipuramNestled along the stunning coastline of Mamallapuram, India, lies the enchanting town of Mahabalipuram. Renowned for its rich cultural heritage and awe-inspiring ancient architecture, this UNESCO World Heritage Site is a must-visit destination for history buffs and art enthusiasts alike.

Step back in time as you explore the magnificent rock-cut temples, monolithic sculptures, and intricately carved bas-reliefs that adorn the town. The iconic Shore Temple, with its breathtaking views of the Bay of Bengal, is a true masterpiece of Dravidian architecture. Marvel at the grandeur of the Five Rathas, monolithic rock temples shaped like chariots, each dedicated to a different deity.

Beyond its architectural wonders, Mahabalipuram offers a serene and picturesque setting. Take a leisurely stroll along the pristine beaches, where you can witness local fishermen casting their nets or simply soak in the tranquil ambiance. Indulge in delicious seafood delicacies at the beachside shacks, offering a taste of the region's culinary delights.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant local culture by visiting the bustling street markets, where you can find exquisite handicrafts, stone sculptures, and traditional silk sarees. Don't miss the opportunity to witness the traditional dance forms of Bharatanatyam and Kathakali, performed by talented artists at the town's cultural centers.

Whether you are seeking a journey through history, a relaxing beach getaway, or an exploration of traditional Indian culture, Mahabalipuram has something to offer every traveler. With its fascinating attractions and idyllic surroundings, this ancient town is sure to leave a lasting impression on your heart and mind.Getting to Kaldan Samudhra Palace from the Nearest AirportsWelcome to Kaldan Samudhra Palace, a magnificent retreat nestled in the heart of Mahabalipuram, Mamallapuram, India. To reach this enchanting destination, you have a few options from the nearest airports.

If you're arriving at Chennai International Airport, which is approximately 58 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you can choose between taxis, private transfers, or public transportation. Taxis and private transfers offer the convenience of a direct journey, allowing you to sit back and enjoy the scenic drive. Alternatively, if you're looking for a more budget-friendly option, you can take a local bus or a train from Chennai to Mahabalipuram, and then hire a rickshaw or taxi to reach the palace.

Another nearby airport is Pondicherry Airport, located around 100 kilometers away from Kaldan Samudhra Palace. This luxurious palace offers a perfect blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, ensuring a truly memorable stay in Mamallapuram, India.Discover the Rich Cultural Heritage of Mamallapuram at Kaldan Samudhra PalaceNestled in the heart of Mamallapuram, Kaldan Samudhra Palace offers a prime location surrounded by a wealth of cultural landmarks and attractions. Immerse yourself in the vibrant atmosphere of this ancient town as you explore the nearby landmarks.

Just a short distance away from the hotel, you'll find the famous Descent of the Ganges, a magnificent rock-cut monument that showcases intricate carvings depicting Hindu mythology. Marvel at the detailed sculptures and reliefs that adorn this UNESCO World Heritage Site, offering a glimpse into the rich artistic heritage of the region.

For a unique experience, venture to Tiger Cave, a rock-cut Hindu temple known for its awe-inspiring architecture and intricate carvings. As you explore the temple complex, you'll be captivated by the serene ambiance and the beautiful surrounding landscapes.

If you're looking to delve deeper into the history of Mamallapuram, make sure to visit Ganesha Ratha, a monolithic rock-cut temple dedicated to Lord Ganesha. Admire the intricate carvings and architectural marvels that make this temple a true gem.

With its convenient location, Kaldan Samudhra Palace allows you to easily access these landmarks and more, ensuring an unforgettable stay immersed in the rich cultural heritage of Mamallapuram.Indulge in a Gastronomic AdventureAt Kaldan Samudhra Palace, you will find yourself surrounded by an array of delightful dining options. For those craving international flavors, Moonrakers Restaurant offers a diverse menu with dishes from around the world. Families with children will also appreciate the hotel's kids' activities and pool.Food & services need improvement, per guests, esp. at dinner.Did you find this review summary helpful?YESNOGuest TypeGuest TypeAll guests (2,005)Business travelers (4)Couples (832)Solo travelers (40)Families with young children (546)Families with teens (83)Groups (218)Room TypeRoom TypeAll room typesDeluxe TwinDeluxe King Pool ViewPremium King With BalconyExecutive Palace Suite KingPremium Suite with BalconyLanguageSelect your countrySelect your countryAll languagesEnglishEnglish / IndiaEnglish / United Kingdom한국어FrançaisDeutschภาษาไทยShow reviews that mention All reviewsswimming pool (30)high tea (10)private beach (8)best place (7)Showing 628 verified guest commentsSort byMost recentRating, high to lowRating, low to highMost helpful12345126Changed to review page 19.6ExceptionalRaghav from CanadaFamily with young childrenDeluxe King Pool ViewStayed 2 nights in May 2025“Good resort with some major tweaks needed”We had a generally lovely stay at Hotel Kaldan Samudra. We were a party of 5 adults and 2 kids 3 and 10. The rooms were spotless and really well-kept, which made a big difference after a long day out. The pool was another highlight — clean, spacious, and a great spot to relax and unwind.

The hotel itself has a nice vibe, and the staff were friendly and helpful throughout our stay. One thing that could use some improvement, though, is the high tea experience. It’s set up outdoors, which sounds nice in theory, but in the heat of the afternoon it gets pretty uncomfortable. There were very few tables around too, which made it tricky to manage food and drinks — especially with kids. On top of that, the food range wasn’t very kid-friendly. The offerings seemed to lean heavily on spicy and Indian dishes, which didn’t go down well with our little ones who struggled with the spice levels. We left feeling hungry. My children are foreigners in India and the kids were a bit overlooked during the high tea, and it would have been nice to have more drink options they could enjoy without having to worry about heat or spice.

The in room dining experience is very pricey and I left feeling wondered how are people affording this. I certainly could not. I did see many people ordering on food apps which I felt was something Kaldan could easily provide. I also ended up ordering on a food app because my kids were going hungry. 

That said, the overall experience was still fairly positive besides food with great potential with just a few major tweaks.Reviewed May 21, 2025Dear Mr. Raghav,

Thank you for sharing your thoughtful feedback about your recent stay at Kaldan Samudhra Palace. We're delighted to hear that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the rooms and had a lovely experience by the pool. 

We truly appreciate your insights regarding the high tea setup and the dining options for children. We will certainly take your suggestions into consideration as we strive to improve our offerings and ensure all our guests, especially the little ones, feel welcomed and catered to.

It's encouraging to know that you found overall enjoyment during your stay, and we look forward to the opportunity to welcome you back with even more enhancements in place.

Best Regards,
Sujith Herbert,
Hotel General Manager,

Our partners listed under this campaign are committed to providing a clean environment to guests and staff by enhancing safety and hygiene measures. These partners have confirmed their compliance with specific safety and hygiene measures and can update their list at any time – providing you with up-to-date information to help you make the most informed choice.<\/p>\n<p>Hygiene Plus is not a guarantee from Agoda that any accommodation is risk-free. We rely on properties to affirm their own safety measures and amenities. As a traveler it is your responsibility to follow government advice, enforce personal hygiene measures, and apply social and physical distancing during your stay. Agoda encourages safe travel always and vigilance to changing conditions.<\/p>\n<p>The safety and hygiene measures currently included in Hygiene Plus are:<\/p>\n<p><strong>Safety procedures<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Extra disinfection throughout public area and all guestrooms, paying attention to frequently touched areas such as elevator buttons, handrails, switches, etc.<\/li>\n<li>Arranging training to ensure property staff is aligned on safety and hygiene protocols.<\/li>\n<li>Daily temperature checks for staff and guests when entering the building or facilities.<\/li>\n<li>Providing online, auto, or self-service check-in to reduce human contact to avoid cross infection.<\/li>\n<li>Installation of a transparent protective shields in public areas between persons during face-to-face transactions.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Protective equipment <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Hand sanitizers placed in all property public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Face covers/masks or other protective equipment worn by property staff.<\/li>\n<li>Sterilizing equipment to remove, kill, or deactivate all bacteria, viruses, etc. <\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Social distancing <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Physical distancing of at least 1 m (3ft) in public areas.<\/li>\n<li>Rearrangement of tables and seating in dining areas to ensure social distancing.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Health and medical<\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>Supplies and equipment used to provide medical treatment are available on site.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<p><strong>Terms and Conditions <\/strong><\/p>\n<ul>\n<li>When you make a reservation with a hotel or accommodation (“Property”) with the Hygiene Plus measures or front end display identifier (“Hygiene Plus”), we wish to make it clear that the Property has self-certified that it has in place the facilities and measures at the Property . As such the Property alone is confirming that they have the facilities (and/or applicable certifications) and that they are performing the listed Hygiene Plus measures related to cleanliness, safety and hygiene at the time of your booking.<\/li>\n<\/ul>\n<ul>\n<li>The Property may update the Hygiene Plus measures it has identified as available from time to time and may choose to opt out of this Hygiene Plus programme if they are no longer fully or partially maintaining such facilities and/or measures.
